Package ohos.usb

Class USBCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.usb.USBCore

  • public class USBCore
extends Object
    Manages USB devices and accessories.

    You can use this class to obtain a list of USB devices and accessories and perform operations such as opening the USB devices and accessories.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_ATTACHED

        public static final String ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_ATTACHED
        Indicates a common event for attaching a USB accessory.

        After subscribing to this event, an application receives a notification and obtains the corresponding accessory information when an USB accessory is attached.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_DETACHED

        public static final String ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_DETACHED
        Indicates a common event for detaching a USB accessory.

        After subscribing to this event, an application receives a notification and performs the corresponding action when a USB accessory is detached.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_USB_DEVICE_ATTACHED

        public static final String ACTION_USB_DEVICE_ATTACHED
        Indicates a common event for attaching a USB device.

        After subscribing to this event, an application receives a notification and obtains the corresponding device information when a USB device is attached.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_USB_DEVICE_DETACHED

        public static final String ACTION_USB_DEVICE_DETACHED
        Indicates a common event for detaching a USB device.

        After subscribing to this event, an application receives a notification and performs the corresponding action when a USB device is detached.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_ACCESSORY

        public static final String EXTRA_ACCESSORY
        Indicates additional accessory data.

        It is additional data contained in the ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_ATTACHED and ACTION_USB_ACCESSORY_DETACHED common events.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_DEVICE

        public static final String EXTRA_DEVICE
        Indicates additional device data.

        It is additional data contained in the ACTION_USB_DEVICE_ATTACHED and ACTION_USB_DEVICE_DETACHED common events.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_PERMISSION_GRANTED

        public static final String EXTRA_PERMISSION_GRANTED
        Indicates that the access permission is granted.

        This INTENT enumeration value is used for granting the USB access permission.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • USBCore

        public USBCore​(Context Context)
        A constructor used to create a Usbkit.
        Parameters:
        Context - Indicates the context of the calling ability.
        Since:

    • Method Detail

      • obtainDeviceList

        public HashMap<String,USBDevice> obtainDeviceList​()
        Returns the hash map of USB devices.

        The hash map contains devices and their names. Applications can traverse USB devices in the hash map to perform operations on the devices. For details on the operations, see USBDevice.

        Returns:
        Returns a hash map containing devices and their names.
        Since:
        1

      • openDevice

        public USBDevicePipe openDevice​(USBDevice device)
        Opens a USB device based on device information returned by obtainDeviceList().

        A USBDevicePipe instance is returned. Data transfer is performed based on the instance.

        Parameters:
        device - Indicates a USBDevicePipe instance.
        Returns:
        Returns a USBDevicePipe instance.
        Since:
        1

      • hasRight

        public boolean hasRight​(USBDevice device)
        Returns true if the caller has right to access the device.
        Parameters:
        device - to check right for
        Returns:
        true if caller has right to access this device
        Since:
        1

      • requestRight

        public void requestRight​(USBDevice device,
                         String intentName)
        Requests temporary permission for the given package to access the device.
        Parameters:
        device - to request permissions for
        intentName - PendingIntent for returning result
